message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $80 is too low, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
